text: Nolan Baumgartner (born March 23, 1976 in Calgary, Alberta) is a Canadian retired ice hockey defenceman. He played a total of 12 seasons in the National Hockey League (NHL). He played for the Washington Capitals for 4 seasons, the Chicago Blackhawks for 1 season, the Vancouver Canucks for 4 seasons, the Pittsburgh Penguins for 1 season, the Philadelphia Flyers for 1 season and the Dallas Stars for 1 season. He was drafted with the 10th overall pick in the 1994 NHL Draft by the Washington Capitals. He also played with the Kamloops Blazers of the WHL. == Other websites == * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Chicago Wolves players Category:Dallas Stars players Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Iowa Stars players Category:Kamloops Blazers players Category:Manitoba Moose players Category:Memorial Cup winners Category:Norfolk Admirals players Category:Philadelphia Flyers players Category:Philadelphia Phantoms players Category:Pittsburgh Penguins players Category:Portland Pirates players Category:Sportspeople from Calgary Category:Vancouver Canucks players Category:Washington Capitals players
title: Nolan Baumgartner
